instruction: Describe a summer day in Istanbul.
output: A summer day in Istanbul is usually sunny and hot, with temperatures reaching up to 95 degrees on the hottest days. The blue skies and shimmering waters of the Bosphorus Strait contrast beautifully against the bright white architecture of the city. In the evening, the streets come alive with locals and tourists alike, enjoying the warm summer night and exploring the numerous attractions the city has to offer.
